name: Body Weight/Barbell Hip Thrust
description: 1. Rest your back firmly against a bench, feet firmly on the ground about shoulder width apart, with glutes touching the floor 2. This exercise may be performed with or without weight 2. If using weight position a barbell across your hips 3. Squeeze your glutes and lift the barbell/hips straight into the air until your hips align with shoulders and knees 4. Slowly return to start position and repeat for desired reps
